metadata.Title: CVE-2020-13933 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Apache Shiro before 1.6.0, when using Apache Shiro, a specially crafted HTTP request may cause an authentication bypass.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-13933` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libshiro-java - 1.3.2-4ubuntu0.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: shiro package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.3.2-4ubuntu0.2').
